title: The Love Machine
description: A blockbuster tale from the 1960s—available again after an absence of 15 years—The Love Machine tells the story of TV-network titan Robin Stone, "around whom women flutter like so many moths . . . and his rise and fall as he makes the international sex scene, drinks unlimited quantities, and checks out the latest Nielsens" (Newsweek).
author: Jacqueline Susann
